issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.

issues.title: Img element is the only content of the link, but is missing alt text. The alt text should describe the purpose of the link.

original_issue.message: Img element is the only content of the link, but is missing alt text. The alt text should describe the purpose of the link.

issues.title: Links do not have a discernible name
issues.description: Link text (and alternate text for images, when used as links) that is discernible, unique, and focusable improves the navigation experience for screen reader users. [Learn how to make links accessible](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-name).

issues.title: Img element inside a link must not use alt text that duplicates the content of a text link beside it.

original_issue.message: Img element inside a link must not use alt text that duplicates the content of a text link beside it.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1) > img
